summary: "Up" is a 2009 Pixar movie about an old man, Carl (voiced by Ed Asner), who goes on an adventure in South America to keep a promise to his late wife. He brings along a young boy, Russell. They face dangers, including someone trying to capture a rare bird. The story was inspired by the director's desire to escape daily life. It was Pixar's first 3D film and got lots of praise for being funny, touching, and well-animated. It made a lot of money and won two Academy Awards, showing that animated films can be just as good as live-action ones.
title: Up (2009 film)
